body:
adding a `version= '43.0'` argument to the get_pings calls 2nd to last cell results in a count of zero heartbeat pings

to be clear, that's prior to any filtering by studyId

after removing the `doc_type= 'heartbeat'` argument in the final cell there are still no pings

to make sure I was using the version arg right I tried version 44.0

updated Spark gist
